email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily Carter,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to provide you with our initial freight quote for the transportation of 15,000MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. The vessel proposed for this shipment is MV OCEAN BREEZE, with a DWT of 85,000.

Our starting quote stands at USD 45.00 per metric ton. The vessel will be available for loading from October 20 to October 25, ensuring minimal port turnaround time.

We look forward to your feedback and are ready to finalize the arrangements at your earliest convenience.

Best Regards,
Alexander Harris
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alexander,

Thank you for the quick response. Considering the current market conditions and the simplicity of the cargo handling for this shipment, could there be a possibility to review the rate? Our operations are streamlined for this type of cargo, which significantly reduces handling costs and time.

Could you please consider this factor in the quote? Looking forward to a revised proposition.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Review for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your points regarding the cargo-handling efficiency. After considering the streamlined operations you've described, I am able to offer a revised rate of USD 43.50 per MT. This adjustment reflects the reduced handling requirement at both ports.

Please let us know if this meets your approval so we can proceed with the necessary documentation and finalize the schedule.

Warm regards,
Alexander Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hello Alexander,

Appreciate the revised quote at USD 43.50 per MT. I would like to request further details on the demurrage terms and the vessel's LOA to ensure there won't be issues during berthing at Shanghai.

Also, could you confirm the laycan period remains as previously stated? A precise schedule is crucial for our operations.

Thank you,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Details & Finalization of Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your continued cooperation. I can confirm that the LOA of MV OCEAN BREEZE is 225m, fully compatible with the docking facilities at Shanghai. Regarding demurrage, we propose a rate of USD 15,000 per day, applicable only if there's a delay beyond the agreed laydays, which remains as October 20-25.

If these terms are acceptable, I suggest we finalize our agreement to secure the vessel for your shipment. Please let us know your decision at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Alexander Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment Agreement: MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alexander,

Everything looks good, and we accept the terms outlined, including the demurrage rate. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork. We are keen to finalize everything promptly to ensure a smooth operation of the shipment.

Thank you for all your efforts in accommodating our requests.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
